titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Special Collections FA1672

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-11-01 04:58:11 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by originating provenance/creator. Within collections, material may be subdivided by series, often by file type. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Prominent special collections include but are not limited to: the papers of the Council on Legal Education for Professional Responsibilities, Inc. (CLEPR); the papers of the Select Committee on the Future of Private and Independent Higher Education in the State of New York; the Ford Foundation Fund files; The Fund for Adult Education (FAE) records; the American Literary Manuscripts (ALM) collection; The Fund for the Advancement of Education, 1939-1976 (TFAE); and the East European Fund. Refer to the individual collections for further details.
